title: Pay Rent Online, Covered Parking, Fitness Center, Large Closets
posting_body: ['Volare', '10695 Dean Martin Drive, Las Vegas, NV, 89141', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 232', 'OR Text', '232', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'Use the link below for more details:', '<URL>', 'Contemporary + Eco-conscious Las Vegas Living', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 762 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Volare’s luxury apartments are designed to a condominium grade and feature inspired lifestyle luxuries to ensure every resident enjoys the comforts of a premium home.', 'Our location is unbeatable for easy visits to the nearby Strip, the community amenities fashion a resort-like atmosphere, and you’ll have all the space you need for quiet relaxation, along with plenty of opportunities for social gatherings.', 'Come right on in and find a home finished and configured for the Las Vegas lifestyle.', 'Pet Policy', 'We Love Pets!', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Tuesday:11:00AM-6:00PM', 'Wednesday-Thursday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Friday-Saturday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'dyI76cAx']
